text:
@SecPompeo The world has awakened to America's role as a rising authoritarian regime, and the implications for free societies. The #Trump-#Pompeo regime's cover-up of the coronavirus disaster throughout the US - which now has killed over 125,000 - has accelerated this awakening.
#COVID19
